Column.Name: Parent Structure

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $targetData := DB_LOOKUPALL( "Panel - Category", "Vendor", "[RecordID] = " & [Add Vendor - RecordID] );
RETURN ARRAY_DISTINCT( ARRAY_WHERE( ARRAY_CONCAT( $targetData, [Category] ), $(i, item) $item <> NULL() ) )

LET $targetData := DB_LOOKUPALL( "Panel - RecordID", "Vendor", "[RecordID] = " & [Add Vendor - RecordID] );
RETURN ARRAY_DISTINCT( ARRAY_WHERE( ARRAY_CONCAT( $targetData, [RecordID] ), $(i, item) $item <> NULL() ) )
ARRAY_WHERE( ARRAY_CONCAT( [Vendor RecordIDs], [Add Vendor - RecordID] ), $(i, item) $item <> NULL() )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Add Vendor ID and Clear Fields

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $targetData := DB_LOOKUPALL( "Panel - Category", "Vendor", "[RecordID] = " & [Remove Vendor - RecordID] );
RETURN ARRAY_DISTINCT( ARRAY_WHERE( $targetData, $(i, item) AND( $item <> NULL(), $item <> [Category] ) ) )

LET $targetData := DB_LOOKUPALL( "Panel - RecordID", "Vendor", "[RecordID] = " & [Remove Vendor - RecordID] );
RETURN ARRAY_DISTINCT( ARRAY_WHERE( $targetData, $(i, item) AND( $item <> NULL(), $item <> [RecordID] ) ) )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Unlink Vendor ID and Clear Fields

Label.Text: This shows all contracts that belong to any vendor that is a part of this panel

TextCriterion.Text: CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers'
